<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swiftmount Saddle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1575)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 91

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn saddle

**Bulk** 2
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sturdy leather saddle was designed to improve communication between mount and rider, allowing even inexperienced knights to command their mounts in battle. A swiftmount saddle grants a +2 item bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks made to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) for anyone who is riding the creature wearing it.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** You're adjacent to the creature wearing the _swiftmount saddle_ and could [Mount](/Actions.aspx?ID=96) it; **Effect** You Mount the creature wearing the _swiftmount saddle_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
